data.title: Contract Insight Contract Management Software
data.meta_description: Contract Insight Contract Management Software - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. Contract Insight Enterprise, by CobbleStone Systems, is an “End-to-End” enterprise level, completely web-enabled Contract Management Software Solution which provides enterprise contract tracking, contract drafting, unlimited custom user-defined fields, custom report design and generation tools, e-mail alerts, calendar reminders, task schedules and checklists, security, document capture and management, check in tracking, workflow, financials, cost control, searching, performance tracking, full text indexing, web platform, web calendaring, and more. It is built upon the latest web-enabled technologies so it can be deployed faster, supported easier, reduce your total cost of ownership and accelerate your return on investment. User Friendly. CobbleStone’s flagship product, Contract Insight Enterprise, is built to be the most intuitive, user-friendly product on the market. Continuous updates, based on user feedback and forward-thinking contracting professionals, allow CobbleStone Systems to continuously enhance system features while maintaining a straight-forward interface. Efficient. CobbleStone’s single point-of-access Contract Management Solution streamlines the contract creation, review, approval, execution, deliverables monitoring, and reporting processes. Reduce organizational risk and manage contractual compliance while increasing productivity with Contract Insight Enterprise. Secure. User security access may be established, by Application Administrators, within the system to delineate the privileges of users on a contract, employee, department/division, and/or security group/role basis. Optionally, security groups/roles may be defined to easily establish permission levels for multiple users with identical access, viewing, and/or alteration privileges. Application Administrators may also define document-level access, field-level alteration privileges and enable the check-in / check-out feature for advanced version control. Contract Insight Enterprise Edition Contract Management Software Solutions L e a d e r s i n C o n t r a c t M a n a g e m e n t S o f t w a r e – w w . C o b b l e S t o n e S y s t e m s . c o m  Boost productivity  Minimize contract cycle time  Ensure regulatory compliance  Provide single-point-of- access for all contract related information  Monitor contract performance  Establish key milestones  Initiate contracts, approve and monitor via desktop or mobile device  Gain contract visibility  Standardize contract creation  Streamline contract collaboration  Take advantage of renegotiation windows  Identify financial goals  Avoid penalties  Eliminate process bottleneck  Execute contract closeouts with accountability A few BENEFITS…

2. CobbleStone Systems is a world-wide leader in providing Contract Management Software Products. Contract Insight Enterprise Contract Management FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS Q A Q A Q A Is Contract Insight Enterprise a SaaS Solution or can the system be deployed on client’s servers? Both. Contract Insight Enterprise can be deployed on client’s servers (behind the firewall), or the system can be hosted at CobbleStone’s corporate datacenter (SaaS). Please see below for client-deployed system requirements. Do limited-user licenses cost the same as full- user (Administrator) licenses? No, CobbleStone Systems provides Admin- user, Super-user, Standard-user, and Read- only user licenses and offers pricing discounts for licenses with limited privilege access. For example, a Read-only user license costs significantly less than and Admin-user license. Can Contract Insight Enterprise be integrated with Accounting, Sales (CRM) or Procurement Management Systems? Yes, Contract Insight Enterprise offers open web-services APIs for firewall-friendly integration with third-party management systems and can be integrated at the MS SQL Database level. THE COBBLESTONE DIFFERENCE Contract Insight Enterprise Optional Modules  Document Collaboration & eSignature  eSourcing Management  Purchase Order Management  Data Integration Management  Vendor/Client Collaboration Gateway  General Public Access Portal  Docusign Connector  Data Synchronization Module  And more… Contact us today for a free demonstration. To learn more about how CobbleStone Systems Best-of-Breed Contract Management Solutions can decrease costs, boost revenue and ensure contracting awareness, please visit www.CobbleStoneSystems.com or contact us directly at 1-866-330-0056. Collaboration Ensure that your organization’s contracting professionals have correct and up-to-date information about each contract, agreement and organizational committal. Flexibility Utilize Contract Insight’s standard configuration or customize the system for particular organizational needs. From contract request forms to approval and review requirements to contract closeout processes, Contract Insight is built to conform to your organization’s contracting policies and procedures. Visibility Contract Insight Enterprise provides a single point-of-access contract repository with personalized dashboards, multiple reporting options and configurable email alerts and calendar notifications to provide end-to-end contract monitoring. Software, by CobbleStone Systems is used by fortune 500 companies around the world. CobbleStone Systems has been providing contract management software solutions since 1995 and has years of client feedback and industry knowledge. CobbleStone Systems is committed to providing the best value Contract Management Solutions in the industry. L e a d e r s i n C o n t r a c t M a n a g e m e n t S o f t w a r e – w w .
